alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Kenton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 27 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT EDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... The Southwest Ohio Air Quality Agency has issued an Air Quality Advisory from midnight tonight to midnight EDT Wednesday night. The Miami Valley Regional Planning Commission has also issued an Air Quality Alert from midnight tonight to midnight EDT Wednesday night. Fine particulate levels are expected to be in the Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups range. Here are some recommended actions that the public can take: * Carpool or use public transportation. * Staying indoors whenever possible. * Monitor indoor air quality by keeping air circulating and checking on indoor filtration systems. * Avoid using the drive-through and combine errands into one trip. * Avoid refueling your vehicle or using gasoline-powered lawn equipment until after 7pm. * Turn off your engine when idling for more than 30 seconds. * Conserve energy by turning off lights or setting the air conditioner to 75 degrees or above. For additional information on Southwest Ohio/Northern Kentucky Air Quality, please visit the Southwest Ohio Air Quality Agency`s web site at www.southwestohioair.org/local_air_quality. For additional information on Miami Valley Air Quality, please visit the Miami Valley Regional Planning commission site at MiamiValleyAir.org
